artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga), mica on kimono; head and torso of woman in profile from PL, arranging her hair, looking in a mirror with pocket for combs, in her PL hand; blue floral kimono
inscription: 昭和六年一月元旦 {Shōwa rokunen ichigatsu gantan} (January 1st, 1931)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | BRC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第百参拾九番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai hyakusanjūkyū ban} (edition of 250, number 139) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: From The First Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai isshū 現代美人集第一輯)
title: Hand Mirror
